channel.title: Need help adding choice,

item.title: Need help adding choice,
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

k, i wanna add a choice when u log in for pure or master, gives all lvl 70 of cb master
and pure att 60 str 70 pray 1 and the rest 70 of cb skills

k so what i did till naw,

added this in client java

		case 90000:
			case 1343:

			talk2("Hello "+playerName+".", "Welcome to the skillingnpking World.", 2244);
			break;
			case 1344:
			choice("Master", "Pure" );
			break;

in clicking most i added,

if(c.NpcDialogue == 1344) {
c.addSkillXP(800000, 0);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 1);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 2);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 3);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 4);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 5);
c.addSkillXP(800000, 6);
c.closeAll();
}

also did this for pure, but when i log in i got no choice? what i forgot or some got good turl?

Read full topic
